# preferredBlendingMode

**Instance Property**

Specifies how the entity and its descendants blend against environments which encompass them.

## Declaration

```swift
var preferredBlendingMode: EnvironmentBlendingComponent.BlendingMode
```
title: preferredBlendingMode
